AT.name: Collide-a-Ball
AT.description: Errichte in diesem einzigartigen Puzzle-Spiel eine Strecke, auf der zwei Bälle am selben Ort und zur gleichen Zeit aufeinandertreffen. Ein roter und ein blauer Ball starten von verschiedenen Ausgangspunkten aus in die Etappe. Bereite den Reiseweg der Bälle durch Platzieren und Drehen von Objekten, wie Gefällen und Beschleunigungsfeldern, so vor, dass sie gleichzeitig an der Zielflagge aufeinandertreffen. Wenn du alles in Szene gesetzt hast, drücke Start, um die zwei Bälle ins Rollen zu bringen. Schaffst du es, beide Bälle gleichzeitig an der Zielflagge kollidieren zu lassen? Collide-a-Ball hat drei Spielmodi: Freies Spiel, Warte und Los! und Einzelball. Free Play (Freies Spiel) Platziere Objekte so, dass zwei Bälle gleichzeitig an der Zielflagge aufeinandertreffen. Wait and Go! (Warte und Los!) Schätze die benötigte Zeitverzögerung zwischen zwei Bällen, um sie gleichzeitig an der Zielflagge aufeinandertreffen zu lassen. Single Ball (Einzelball) Platziere Objekte entlang der Etappe, um einen Ball genau an der Zielflagge anzuhalten.

AU.name: Collide-a-Ball
AU.description: Set up a course to make two balls meet at the same place and time in this unique puzzle game. A red and blue ball start from different places in the stage. Position and rotate objects such as slopes and acceleration panels to prepare the path for the balls to travel so they meet at the goal flag at the same time. Once you've set the scene hit Start to trigger the two balls rolling. Can you make the two balls collide at the goal flag at the same time? Collide-a-Ball includes three game modes: Free Play, Wait and Go! and Single Ball. Free Play Position objects to make the two balls meet at the goal flag at the same time. Wait and Go! Judge the time delay needed between two balls to make them meet at the goal flag at the same time. Single Ball Position objects around the stage to make one ball stop exactly on the goal flag.

BG.name: Collide-a-Ball
BG.description: Set up a course to make two balls meet at the same place and time in this unique puzzle game. A red and blue ball start from different places in the stage. Position and rotate objects such as slopes and acceleration panels to prepare the path for the balls to travel so they meet at the goal flag at the same time. Once you've set the scene hit Start to trigger the two balls rolling. Can you make the two balls collide at the goal flag at the same time? Collide-a-Ball includes three game modes: Free Play, Wait and Go! and Single Ball. Free Play Position objects to make the two balls meet at the goal flag at the same time. Wait and Go! Judge the time delay needed between two balls to make them meet at the goal flag at the same time. Single Ball Position objects around the stage to make one ball stop exactly on the goal flag.

BE.name: Collide-a-Ball
BE.description: Dans ce jeu de casse-tête unique, vous devez créer un itinéraire pour que deux balles se rencontrent au même endroit au même moment. Une balle bleue et une balle rouge partent d'emplacements différents dans le niveau. Positionnez et pivotez des objets tels que des panneaux d'accélération et des pentes pour préparer la route que les balles doivent emprunter afin qu'elles arrivent ensemble au drapeau. Une fois que tout est en place, appuyez sur « Départ » pour lancer les deux balles. Pourrez-vous faire en sorte que les deux balles se rencontrent en même temps au drapeau d'arrivée ? Collide-a-Ball comprend trois modes de jeu : Jeu Libre, Prêt ? Partez ! et Balle Unique. Free Play (Jeu Libre) Installez les objets afin que les deux balles atteignent l'objectif en même temps. Wait and Go ! (Prêt ? Partez !) Estimez le délai nécessaire entre les balles pour qu'elles atteignent le drapeau d'arrivée ensemble. Single Ball (Balle Unique) Installez des objets tout au long du niveau pour que la balle s'arrête au drapeau d'arrivée.

ES.name: Collide-a-Ball
ES.description: Organiza un circuito para conseguir que dos bolas se encuentren al mismo tiempo y en el mismo lugar en este juego de puzle único. Una bola roja y otra azul salen desde distintos puntos de la plataforma. Coloca y rota los objetos, como pendientes y paneles de aceleración, para preparar el camino de las bolas de tal modo que lleguen a la bandera de meta a la vez. Una vez que hayas organizado el recorrido pulsa Start para que comiencen a rodar. ¿Serás capaz de hacer que lleguen a la vez a la bandera de meta? Collide-a-Ball incluye tres modos de juego: juego libre, el momento justo y bola única. Free Play (Juego libre) Coloca los objetos para hacer que las dos bolas se encuentren en la bandera de meta a la vez. Wait and Go! (El momento justo) Calcula la diferencia de tiempo necesaria entre las dos bolas para que lleguen a la vez a la bandera de meta. Single Ball (Bola única) Coloca objetos por toda la plataforma para hacer que una bola se detenga justo en la bandera de meta.

IT.name: Collide-a-Ball
IT.description: Crea un percorso per fare in modo che due palline raggiungano lo stesso punto nello stesso istante in questo singolare puzzle game. Una pallina rossa e una blu partono da posizioni differenti. Prepara il percorso per le palline in movimento piazzando e ruotando oggetti, quali piste e pannelli di accelerazione, in modo che possano raggiungere contemporaneamente la bandierina designata. Una volta preparata la scena, premi Start per fare in modo che le due palline inizino a rotolare. Riuscirai a far scontrare le due palline sulla bandierina? Collide-a-Ball include tre modalità di gioco: Gioco libero, Aspetta e vai! e Pallina Singola. Free Play (Gioco libero) Posiziona gli oggetti per fare in modo che le due palline raggiungano la bandierina nello stesso momento. Wait and Go! (Aspetta e vai!) Tieni in considerazione le diverse tempistiche delle due palline, affinché raggiungano la bandierina nello stesso momento. Single Ball (Pallina Singola) Posiziona gli oggetti sulla scena in modo che una pallina si fermi esattamente sulla bandierina designata.

NL.name: Collide-a-Ball
NL.description: Maak een parcours om twee ballen op hetzelde moment en dezelfde plaats samen te brengen in deze unieke puzzelgame. Een rode en een blauwe bal starten vanaf verschillende plaatsen in het veld. Plaats en draai objecten zoals hellingen en versnellingspanelen om de trajecten van de ballen voor te bereiden, zodat ze de vlag op hetzelfde moment bereiken. Als je klaar bent druk je op Start om de ballen te laten rollen. Kun jij ervoor zorgen dat de twee ballen de vlag op hetzelfde moment bereiken? Collide-a-Ball bevat drie spelvarianten: Vrij spelen, Wacht en ga! en Enkele bal. Free Play (Vrij spelen) Plaats objecten zodat twee ballen de vlag op hetzelfde moment bereiken. Wait and Go! (Wacht en ga!) Bepaal de tijdsvertraging die nodig is zodat de twee ballen de vlag op hetzelfde moment bereiken. Single Ball (Enkele bal) Plaats objecten in het veld om één bal precies bij de vlag te laten stoppen.

NZ.name: Collide-a-Ball

PT.name: Collide-a-Ball
PT.description: Estabelece uma trajetória de modo a que duas bolas terminem no mesmo sítio e ao mesmo tempo, neste jogo puzzle excecional. Uma bola vermelha e uma bola azul irão partir de diferentes locais. Posiciona e faz girar objetos, tais como declives e painéis de aceleração, preparando o trajeto de forma a que as bolas se desloquem e se encontrem na meta exatamente ao mesmo tempo. Quando o cenário estiver pronto, pressiona Start para que as bolas comecem a rolar. Serás capaz de fazer as duas bolas colidir na meta ao mesmo tempo? Collide-a-Ball inclui três modos de jogo: Jogo Livre, Espera e Avança! e Bola Única. Free Play (Jogo Livre) Posiciona objetos de forma a que as duas bolas alcancem a meta exatamente ao mesmo tempo. Wait and Go! (Espera e Avança!) Calcula o tempo de atraso necessário entre duas bolas, de forma a que elas alcancem a meta exatamente ao mesmo tempo. Single Ball (Bola Única) Posiciona objetos no cenário, de forma a que uma bola pare extamente na meta.

RU.name: Collide-a-Ball
RU.description: Задайте траекторию таким образом, чтобы два шара встретились одновременно в одном и том же месте в этой необыкновенной игре-головоломке. Красный и синий шары начинают в разных местах. Расположите и вращайте объекты, такие как наклонную панель или панель для ускорения, чтобы подготовить маршрут для шаров таким образом, чтобы они встретились одновременно на финишном флажке. После того как вы создадите желаемую обстановку, нажмите Старт для запуска обоих шаров. Сможете ли вы столкнуть два шара одновременно на финишном флажке? Collide-a-Ball включает в себя три режима игры: «свободная игра», «подождите и вперед!» и «один мяч». Free Play (Свободная игра) Расположите объекты так, чтобы два шара встретились на финишном флажке одновременно. Wait and Go! (Подождите и вперед!) Рассчитайте время между запуском двух шаров так, чтобы они встретились на финишном флажке одновременно. Single Ball (Один мяч) Расположите объекты так, чтобы шар остановился точно возле финишного флажка.

SE.name: Collide-a-Ball
SE.description: Set up a course to make two balls meet at the same place and time in this unique puzzle game. A red and blue ball start from different places in the stage. Position and rotate objects such as slopes and acceleration panels to prepare the path for the balls to travel so they meet at the goal flag at the same time. Once you've set the scene hit Start to trigger the two balls rolling. Can you make the two balls collide at the goal flag at the same time? Once you've set the scene hit Start to trigger the two balls rolling. Can you make the two balls collide at the goal flag at the same time? Collide-a-Ball includes three game modes: Free Play, Wait and Go! and Single Ball. Free Play Position objects to make the two balls meet at the goal flag at the same time. Wait and Go! Judge the time delay needed between two balls to make them meet at the goal flag at the same time. Single Ball Position objects around the stage to make one ball stop exactly on the goal flag.

SK.name: Collide-a-Ball
SK.description: Set up a course to make two balls meet at the same place and time in this unique puzzle game. A red and blue ball start from different places in the stage. Position and rotate objects such as slopes and acceleration panels to prepare the path for the balls to travel so they meet at the goal flag at the same time.
